#summary On the Origin of Species
#labels Featured


 * SANE development has traditionally been quite slow

 * The SANE 2.0 draft is still incomplete and no-one has committed building the core of it.

 * No consensus could be reached to develop an improved version.

The only solution left was to fork SANE. SANE Evolution was then born
in march 2008 and aims to produce a better SANE by slightly improving
it over time.
